Detailed Description

Control of a simulated autonomous Twizy.

This file contains definitions for the "brain" of the Twizy Webots controller which handles connections to simulated sensors and overarching processing like publishing ROS clock messages

Author
Ossian Eriksson <ossia.nosp@m.ne@s.nosp@m.tuden.nosp@m.t.ch.nosp@m.almer.nosp@m.s.se>
